attributes.action: review government procedures in the wake of unprecedented catastrophes including Foot & Mouth epidemics,Bio security breaches , Blue Tongue disease, Flu HN51 strain epidemics, Terrorism acts at Airports,Addition errors on Immigration levels,Employment of illegal immigrants in Government and Security centres,Health  and Safety Breaches by the MET,Handling of flood crises,Loss of sensitive personal data by Government, and Responses to instability in the financial markets,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: What procedures are you referring to? Can you request some specific action?
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
